Regional Brown Clubs
Find Brown alumni groups in your area, such as a club or affinity group chapter. 








Brown alumni are everywhere—you just need to know where to look.

More than 100 Brown clubs help to maintain the connection between Brown and its graduates around the world. Connect with the groups in your area on the web, by email, or through social media. Find contact information for any club leader in the online alumni directory.
